abstract: Despite the gyrations of the market over the past few weeks, the last 25 years have have seen a remarkable bull market.
snippet: Despite the gyrations of the market over the past few weeks, the last 25 years have have seen a remarkable bull market.
lead_paragraph: IT has not been the best few weeks ever for stock market investors, but it has been the best 25 years.

headline.main: Ignore the Last Few Weeks. It’s Been a Heck of a 25 Years.
headline.print_headline: Ignore the Last Few Weeks. It’s Been a Heck of a 25 Years.
